data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: to blow with the mouth, breathe.
data.sentence: The word يُنْفَخُ comes from the root ن ف خ and is associated with the meanings: to blow with the mouth, breathe.

data.meanings: to shape/form, fashion mark, picture, adorn, prepare, make.
data.sentence: The word الصُّورِ comes from the root ص و ر and is associated with the meanings: to shape/form, fashion mark, picture, adorn, prepare, make.

data.meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake
data.sentence: The word فَتَأْتُونَ comes from the root ا ت ي and is associated with the meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake

data.meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.
data.sentence: The word أَفْوَاجًا comes from the root ف و ج and is associated with the meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.
